entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is watching Harry and trying to get him to drink something offered by a known enemy.

entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore's whereabouts are unknown, and Umbridge suspects that Harry knows where he is.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry is being questioned by Umbridge about Dumbledore's whereabouts and is trying to avoid drinking something offered by a known enemy.

relationships.description: Umbridge is questioning Harry about Dumbledore's whereabouts and trying to get him to drink something offered by a known enemy.
Mad-Eye Moody's magical eyes are mentioned as similar to Harry's current situation, which is being manipulated by Umbridge.
Umbridge suspects that Harry and Dumbledore have been working together from the beginning, which is why she thinks Harry knows where Dumbledore is.
